医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
他汀类药物可降低乳腺癌死亡率血清胆固醇水平、他汀类药物使用和乳腺癌 (BC) 死亡率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Statins-may-reduce-breast-cancer-mortality-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Statins-may-reduce-breast-cancer-mortality-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=444471fd-b8b8-4d21-a769-811dfa346fc4 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 04:48:00 -0500 Statins may reduce breast cancer mortality rates
儿童不孕症与自闭症谱系障碍风险之间的关联不孕症与其治疗自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Association- Between-infertility-and-autism-spectrum-disorder-risk-among-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Association- Between-infertility-and-autism-spectrum-disorder-risk-among-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e22b6561-4e54-4514-a918-06d000f3f689 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 04:06:00 -0500 Association between infertility and autism spectrum disorder risk among children
系统评价显示，食用坚果与提高男性生育能力有关一项系统综述发现，每天食用至少 60 克坚果可通过改善精子活力、活力和形态来显着提高男性生育能力，而食用坚果对女性生育能力影响的证据仍然有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Nut-conspiration-linked-to-improved-male-fertility-systematic-review-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Nut-conspiration-linked-to-improved-male-fertility-systematic-review-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2816def3-ee61-4527-8493-93a2df58c703 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 23:07:00 -0500 Nut consumption linked to improved male fertility, systematic review reveals
研究表明母乳中的蛋白质和碳水化合物对婴儿生长至关重要，而脂肪则较少系统评价研究了母乳常量营养素对婴儿生长的影响，发现可消化碳水化合物会增加婴儿体重，乳蛋白与婴儿身长增加相关，而乳脂与生长结果没有一致的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-shows-mothers-milk- Proteins-and-carbs-crucial-for-infant-growth-fat-less-so.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-shows-mothers-milk- Proteins-and-carbs-crucial-for-infant-growth-fat-less-so.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa82dd74-e877-448d-bf43-cf6bb5f44a40 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 22:39:00 -0500 Study shows mother's milk proteins and carbs crucial for infant growth, fat less so
专家建议使用基因组学来解决抗菌素耐药性，并概述有效监测的关键策略《柳叶刀微生物》文章总结了耐药感染监测和流行病学联盟关于使用基因组学进行抗菌药物耐药性监测的讨论，强调了其好处和挑战，并为有效实施提供了关键建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Experts-recommend-genomics-for-tackling-antimicrobial-resistance-outline-key-strategies-for- effective-surveillance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Experts-recommend-genomics-for-tackling-antimicrobial-resistance-outline-key-strategies-for- effective-surveillance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e91a1a50-0787-4a1c-9745-48a11d9d27f0 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 22:14:00 -0500 Experts recommend genomics for tackling antimicrobial resistance, outline key strategies for effective surveillance
英国生物银行的新研究显示，含糖饮料与更高的痴呆风险有关研究发现，摄入游离糖，尤其是果汁饮料、苏打水和乳饮料等饮料，会增加患痴呆症的风险，而固体食物中的游离糖与痴呆症风险没有显着关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Sugary-drinks-linked-to-higher-dementia-risk-new-study-from-UK-Biobank-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Sugary-drinks-linked-to-higher-dementia-risk-new-study-from-UK-Biobank-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b2f1f8e-38ee-4607-b401-497bf7645abe Mon, 20 Nov 2023 21:49:00 -0500 Sugary drinks linked to higher dementia risk, new study from UK Biobank reveals
新研究将 GLP1R 基因中的 DNA 甲基化与无代谢紊乱的肥胖联系起来该研究调查了GLP1R基因多态性的表观遗传变化对代谢健康肥胖（MHO）的作用，揭示除了遗传变异外，DNA甲基化也显着影响MHO的发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/New-study-links-DNA-methylation-in-GLP1R-gene-to-obesity-without-metabolic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/New-study-links-DNA-methylation-in-GLP1R-gene-to-obesity-without-metabolic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=384800bc-1c2f-4e67-b12e-78e36541e2c5 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 21:29:00 -0500 New study links DNA methylation in GLP1R gene to obesity without metabolic disorders
研究揭露人工智能图像生成器在描绘外科医生方面存在偏见，凸显性别和种族差异该研究分析了人工智能生成的外科医生图像中性别和种族多样性的表现，发现三分之二的流行人工智能文本到图像生成器主要将外科医生描绘为白人和男性，这与该领域的实际多样性形成鲜明对比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-exposes-AI-image-generators-bias-in-depicting-surgeons-highlighting-gender-and-racial-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-exposes-AI-image-generators-bias-in-depicting-surgeons-highlighting-gender-and-racial-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b4c3d4d-87fa-4daf-864e-6719d4c2f7fb Mon, 20 Nov 2023 21:19:00 -0500 Study exposes AI image generators' bias in depicting surgeons, highlighting gender and racial disparities
城市环境质量与乳腺癌发病率相关杜克健康中心对北卡罗来纳州乳腺癌的分析显示，该州城市县的总体发病率高于农村县，尤其是在诊断的早期阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Urban-environmental-quality-linked-to-breast-cancer-incidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Urban-environmental-quality-linked-to-breast-cancer-incidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67633c95-c607-4a2c-a9dd-feb4b345595e Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:58:46 -0500 Urban environmental quality linked to breast cancer incidence
德克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校的研究人员开发了预测癌症治愈率的改进模型随着过去几十年计算能力的快速发展，机器学习（ML）技术在医疗环境中变得流行，作为预测癌症、心脏病、中风等疾病患者的生存率和预期寿命的一种方法。以及最近的新冠肺炎 (COVID-19)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/UT-Arlington-researchers-develop-improved-model-for-predicting-cancer-cure-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/UT-Arlington-researchers-develop-improved-model-for-predicting-cancer-cure-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e15f38b5-781f-46b5-8208-a45fd128dac0 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:53:48 -0500 UT Arlington researchers develop improved model for predicting cancer cure rates
